review_title: Doesn’t work over Bunch. Can’t join VR
one_reviews_text:
This game only appears to work if you play with a friend in VR.     

FEATURES THAT DON’T WORK!

1.  The options to join a VR game from your phone does not work. Password always says incorrect passwords

2. The option to play over bunch does not work. When attempting to play with a friend you get placed in a waiting room, then it says the room closed. There’s no button to start the game!

Shame that so many playing options do not work!
review_feedback:
Sorry that you have encountered these issues!
If you want to play a multiplayer game with mobile players please make sure you select the 'Face to Face' Game Mode option when you Host a Game. Mobile players cannot join the normal Online Multiplayer matches (which may explain the incorrect password error you have been encountering)
If you continue to face issues please contact crew@spaceteamvr.com and we will help you the best we can

one_reviews_text: This game is so fun and each level is always different.  There are so many random aspects thrown in that make each game addicting and incredibly enjoyable.   Communication is key and a blast!

Can’t host or join a game. Just shows “error” or no game found.
Very disappointing.

Hope this gets addressed soon.
review_feedback: Hi - apologies for the delay in replying, could you mail us at crew@spaceteamvr.com if you're still having issues? We've had people playing a LOT of games successfully! Thanks

review_title: Really fun... works fine on quest...but
one_reviews_text: The game keeps crashing on RIFT. My only rift VR title that crashes every session with a fatal error.
review_feedback: Hello! Please could you let us know the details of the crash you experienced? If you email crew@spaceteamvr.com with details we can look into it! Thank you!
